description:
This is the time not to have Apple Intelligence but your own intelligence! How do I personally live with technology without following the fads and being a normie? Do I live in a cave? Well in this video, I discuss what I actually do in my day to day, my choices of products, specifically electronics. And see if you can live without an Apple Watch.

title: How to Be Cool Without Listening to Tim Cook
